task.title: Computer
task.shortdesc: Square users can start taking payments on their computers in minutes with no monthly fees.

taskbody.context:
This task allows Square users to get their money fast and access their funds in their bank account the next day.
To take payments via the Computer:

step.cmd: Log in to your Square account and go to the Virtual Terminal.

substep.cmd: To log in to Square, go to.
Then, click the three bar icon next to "Home" to open a menu bar.

step.cmd: On the Virtual Terminal page, click the "Take a Payment" button.
Fill in your customer 's information or choose a customer that is already on file.

substep.cmd: Square users can do a Quick Charge or and Itemized Sale.
Fill out the amount, enter a note, payment method and card details

step.cmd: When complete, charge the customer by clicking the "Charge" button in the top right corner.
